definition: particle indicating that a previously asked question is to be applied to the preceding word ("What about ...?", "And ...?")/particle for inquiring about location ("Where is ...?")/particle signaling a pause, to emphasize the preceding words and allow the listener time to take them on board ("ok?", "are you with me?")/(at the end of a declarative sentence) particle indicating continuation of a state or action/particle indicating strong affirmation
mouth/classifier for things with mouths (people, domestic animals, cannons, wells etc)/classifier for bites or mouthfuls
Buddhist nun/(often used in phonetic spellings)
tweed cloth (used for military uniforms etc)
whispering in a low voice (idiom); murmuring
Om Mani Padme Hum (Sanskrit), or Om Mani Peme Hung (Tibetan), the Avalokiteshvara mantra
pinyin: an3 ma5 ni2 ba1 mi1 hong1

sentences.english: So what happens in the very likely event they find more tainted products?
sentences.chinese: 那麼，如果在整治中發現了更加有害的產品呢？

sentences.english: No buts. You tin melodrama extinction afterward.
sentences.chinese: 別說可是，還輪不到你絕種呢。

sentences.english: So, combustible ice is how come from?
sentences.chinese: 那麼，可燃冰是怎麼來的呢？

sentences.english: And who can argue with Orwell?
sentences.chinese: 誰可以跟奧維爾爭論呢？

sentences.english: How do you find an ‘Island of Misfit Foods’ near you?
sentences.chinese: 你是如何尋找周圍的“非適當食品小島”的呢？

sentences.english: What were the subtexts of this venerable tale?
sentences.chinese: 這部古老的童話所暗含的意義是什麼呢？

sentences.english: Q. How many fundamentalists does it take to screw in a light bulb?
sentences.chinese: 把一個燈泡轉進燈座，需要多少位基要派呢？

sentences.english: I asked my colleague you in that school? He said that in.
sentences.chinese: 我問我同事你在那上學呢？他說在，電大。

sentences.english: The salesperson said it was a famous world brand.
sentences.chinese: 那個售貨員說是世界名牌呢。

sentences.english: Stop weeping for such an unthankful man like him!
sentences.chinese: 何必爲他沒良心的人哭泣呢？

sentences.english: Where had he obtained that blouse?
sentences.chinese: 那件布罩衫，他是從什麼地方得來的呢？

sentences.english: Why should the wind do his bidding? The wind is just wind.
sentences.chinese: 爲什麼風要爲他服務呢？，風就是風。

sentences.english: What does pop music do for us that's very helpful?
sentences.chinese: 就這點而言流行音樂對我們來說有什麼用處呢？

sentences.english: 'I am, ' replied the Doger. 'I'd scorn to be anything else.
sentences.chinese: “是啊，”機靈鬼答道，“別的行當我還瞧不上呢。”

sentences.english: What happens when you mix flour with water?
sentences.chinese: 你混合水和麪粉的時候會發生什麼事呢？

definition: finally/in the end/when all is said and done/after all/to the end/to the last
like that/in that way/or so/so/so very much/about/in that case
to go to the bottom of a matter/after all/when all is said and done/(in an interrogative sentence) finally/outcome/result
(particle equivalent to 啊 after a vowel, expressing surprise or doubt)
is or isn't/yes or no/whether or not
interjection expressing doubt or requiring answer/Eh?/what?
interjection of surprise or doubt/Eh?/My!/what's up?
interjection or grunt of agreement/uhm/Ah, OK/expression of recognition/Oh, it's you!
modal particle ending sentence, showing affirmation, approval, or consent
variant of 怎麼|怎么[zen3 me5]
(modal particle indicating suggestion or surmise)/...right?/...OK?/...I presume.
bar (loanword) (serving drinks, or providing Internet access etc)/to puff (on a pipe etc)/(onom.) bang/abbr. for 貼吧|贴吧[tie1 ba1]
to know/to become aware of/also pr. [zhi1 dao5]
to take a look at/to examine/to survey/(coll.) pretty soon
that/those/then (in that case)/commonly pr. [nei4] before a classifier, esp. in Beijing
